description_html:
HALO brings lasting beauty and award-winning innovation to your meeting spaces.

Stunning tables are encircled by the revolutionary Halo edge; providing protection for table and chair while delivering vital connectivity. Conference seating striking the table edge is defended from damage by the remarkable perimeter profile. Table surfaces are equally protected and remain pure in material and form with power and data seamlessly integrated into the Halo edge.

Modern sideboard storage and bench options complement Halo tables and can be configured to meet any need. Thoughtful modules accommodate refrigeration, cutlery, glassware, and more. Mix-and-match components to create a solution perfectly-tailored to your unique meeting space.
